title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Kuja Black Mage Wizard Spellslinger  $60 Budget Magic
videos.description:
Final Fantasy is here and we kick things off with a Rakdos spellslinger deck that's looking to win by making a ton of Black Mage Wizard tokens and flipping Kuja, Genome Sorcerer all on just a $60 budget!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) a https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/budget-magic-60-kuja-black-mage-wizards-final-fantasy-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7146407#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/VovMN
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/oDKBG
